trends.topic: Anthropic’s new multi-session Claude SDK and the race to solve AI agents
trends.reason: Anthropic’s release of a multi-session Claude SDK is a concrete product move in the hotly contested AI agents space, promising more persistent, capable agents and directly challenging rival orchestration and agent frameworks across the industry.
trends.search_keywords: Anthropic, Claude, AI agents, multi-session SDK, agent framework, LLM
